meanings.definition: A system of land tenure in which property is divided equally among all heirs.
meanings.sent1: In gavelkind, each heir gets an equal share of the land.
meanings.sent2: The gavelkind tradition ensures fair distribution of property among family members.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, they joked about dividing the inheritance gavelkind style.
meanings.sent4: The concept of gavelkind turns inheritance into a democratic process.
meanings.sent5: The principle of gavelkind promotes equality in land inheritance.
